html:
12.17.19  4:18 pm   i've been living alone for going on two years now and Holy Shit Let Me Tell You my relationship with my parents has improved by a fucktillion orders of magnitude now that i don't live with them. does this make me an antisocial person or am i ok

     it sounds like you are doing pretty good

12.17.19  4:01 pm   What's the worst part about your job as a musician/entertainer

     guilt and doubt

      and what's the best part? 

     filling out forms that ask what my job is

12.17.19  3:42 pm   Are you a gamer

     am game

12.17.19  3:42 pm   What should I write my essay about?

     how about this

12.17.19  3:32 pm   What should I do with my life knowing we are creatures living on a floating rock somewhere in an infinite dark space filled with other floating rocks and gas balls that are on fire that I'll never see from up close cause we are imprisoned by a floating rock with oxygen?

     try to focus on how many billions of things and people exist right inside the boundaries of our world here

12.17.19  3:16 pm   Will you tell me your life story if I ask nicely?

     i am trying

12.17.19  3:15 pm   Do you feel bored often?

     no

12.17.19  3:07 pm   What is the answer to life?

     you

12.17.19  3:00 pm   tips on studying for a test without actually reviewing the material?

     just study something else you're more interested in. at this point you're not gonna do well on the test, so you might as well use the time nicely

12.17.19  2:59 pm   i've made two albums and i'm pretty proud of my work but after each one i let myself have a break from trying to write new music all the time and it fucks over my creativity , thoughts?

     that may be true. i've heard from other creators, and found this somewhat true myself, you should write all the time if you want to stay good at it

12.17.19  2:31 pm   In "expert mode" the last item on the list is "y2k or whatever" but it doesn't have any link attached to it?
help

     expert mode does not have to have links. sometimes it's just just an indication of certain points in time. the year 2000 has been known as 'y2k.' hope that helps

12.17.19  2:12 pm   do my essay

     ok, it's done

12.17.19  2:02 pm   hows the technological exploration going

     stupid, i'm stupid

12.17.19  1:57 pm   People talk about parallel universes on a semi-regular basis, but what about those perpendicular universes?

     universes can be at any angle. they might even be spinning

12.17.19  1:56 pm   why does your 'reality' page ask for a password?

     to encourage you to respect the sensitivity of the content there

12.17.19  1:54 pm   Is it possible to answer all of the questions?

     no

12.17.19  1:54 pm   What are you doing when you're not altering the fundamental laws of physics and the world around us?

     could be on lunch break

12.17.19  1:34 pm   Is one able to multitask?

     yes

      I'll answer this one for you, it's no.

Though apparently a lot of people expect this near-impossible anomaly of the brain of me. Ugh.

     it depends on the tasks

12.17.19  1:19 pm   Are you still trying to be reasonable?

     yes

      Any progress?

     yes, even though it often doesn't feel like it

12.17.19  1:15 pm   Aren't chromosomes all kinds of wonderful? Just like big balls of yarn, but with lots of useful information built in.

     i see what you mean

12.17.19  1:01 pm   what are sandwiches 

     they are hotdogs, which is technically considered both a soup and a cereal

12.17.19  12:56 pm   What if the earth is not a sphere that we're around but an inverted sphere that the universe is inside of?

     i would struggle to comprehend how there is more space further away from the surface, than close to it

12.17.19  12:49 pm   What do you want for Christmas ?

     a pine cone

12.17.19  12:20 pm   if you could make one thing in this world abnormally large, what would it be?

     clean water supply

12.17.19  12:20 pm   if there were two februarys, what would we call the second february?

     february B

        or the first?

     february A

12.17.19  12:12 pm   How do I concentrate in doing something

      first explain what the thing is

12.17.19  12:10 pm   12.15.19  1:37 pm what is the superstitious reason(s)?

     i'm scared

12.17.19  12:10 pm   Hey Bill! Did you ever consider a career other than music,

     not entirely

      and if so what was it? And if it was a struggle to choose between the two, what made you choose to make the leap?
-Internet Person

     over time i have realized it's important to become capable of visual media production, as a way to support the music. and at times i have flipped that around and just made videos with music to support. extremely useful. music and video are each other's best friend

12.17.19  12:02 pm   Do you own any cool rocks, crystals or fossils? 

     no

12.17.19  12:01 pm   i think there was a 3D box in might quit

     there have been many bits of 3D in my videos for the last few years. but that is surely only scratching the surface

12.17.19  11:34 am   what is a camera 

     nowadays everything is a camera. your best friend might be a camera

12.17.19  11:30 am   thoughts on the practicalities of three-legged chairs?

     cost effective, when you really start breaking down the cost per leg

12.17.19  11:28 am   Can I be a duck?

     yes, thank you for asking permission from me

12.17.19  11:27 am   When the days get darker do you ever get extremely tired and feel like suffocating yourself with a blanket at noon?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.17.19  11:22 am   fire truck or moster truck?

     if you are looking for something that would look great in the new office, i'd say definitely a mobster truck

12.17.19  11:19 am   If/when you do a live show, how will you handle the horn players parts? Would you keep their parts still super sparse like your recordings or would you rearrange your music a bit? Perhaps add some longer solo sections? Just curious how you would handle that.

     new arrangements for everything. the reason the recordings have such short horn parts is because it's fake horns, and with longer parts it would be too fake. (sometimes i do that for a different, fake horn sort of effect). with real horns, entirely different rules apply

12.17.19  10:44 am   Do you think Canada exists?

     yes

      If so, is alaska an island?

     no

12.17.19  10:38 am   how many pencils can you eat in 3 minutes?

     stop the timer. i'm not doing that

12.17.19  10:34 am   are pancakes made of cakes or pans

     is cake. in a pan. made of slop

12.17.19  10:34 am   Do u like going to concerts 

     for research purposes only

12.17.19  10:33 am   not to get political or anything, but what the heck is oatmeal?

     slop

12.17.19  10:23 am   Are u hyped about the new year?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.17.19  10:22 am   which nouns deserve the "i" plural rule the most? i nominal the scariest animal, seagull.

     walri

12.17.19  10:09 am   Shine on and never stop you absolute gem. Are you a diamond?

     i am more like a paper cash note

12.17.19  9:42 am   How does it make you feel to know that one of your songs was my alarm this morning?

     you're gonna start to hate that one

12.17.19  9:35 am   How do manage do make you music sound so good?

     that is just a side effect of being a demon

12.17.19  9:06 am   Do you like bricks

     i love them. for christmas i am getting a brick

12.17.19  8:40 am   Why is anything?

     ah, i see your point. i will change it

12.17.19  8:31 am   what happens if i accidentally join the soviet union   

     you'll want to go ahead and learn the accordion

12.17.19  8:23 am   how do you feel about italian food?

     good
